title: Badlands National Park
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 718 words, Level O (Grade 2)            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and L
description: Badlands National Park, located in South Dakota, is a strange and beautiful place that attracts many visitors each year. From rolling grasslands to stunning rocky ridges, this land is home to a wide variety of plants and animals. Badlands National Park introduces students to the history and many unique features of the park. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify main idea and supporting details as well as to identify and use adjectives. The books and lesson are also available for levels I and L.
